steps.en: Day 1: Take 5 minutes for slow deep breathing. Inhale 4s, hold 2s, exhale 6s.
steps.ur: Din 1: 5 minute gehri saans lein. 4 second mein saans lein, 2 second rokain, 6 second mein chhorein.

steps.en: Day 2: Write down 3 things you are grateful for today.
steps.ur: Din 2: Aaj ki teen cheezein likhein jin ke liye shukar guzar hain.

steps.en: Day 3: Take a 10-minute walk and notice your surroundings.
steps.ur: Din 3: 10 minute ki sair karein aur apne irgird ke manazir ko dekhein.

steps.en: Day 4: Drink water slowly, focusing on each sip.
steps.ur: Din 4: Pani dheere dheere piyein, har sip par tawajjo dein.

steps.en: Day 5: Call or message a trusted friend to share how you feel.
steps.ur: Din 5: Kisi dost ko phone karein ya paigham bhejein aur apni feelings share karein.

steps.en: Day 6: Do a simple stretching routine for 5 minutes.
steps.ur: Din 6: 5 minute ka simple stretching routine karein.

steps.en: Day 7: Reflect on your progress. Note one habit you want to continue.
steps.ur: Din 7: Apni taraqqi par ghour karein. Aik aadat likhein jo aap jari rakhna chahte hain.
